mapper.select:
SELECT /* ReportMasterMapper_001 */ report_form_bucket_name , report_form_key_name , report_title , report_preservation_period , printer_name , outer_command_execute_flag , auto_print_server_ip_address FROM m_report_master WHERE report_id = #{report_id} AND report_type = #{report_type} AND country_code = #{country_code}
AND apply_start_date <= now() AND apply_end_date >= now()
